transfer.description: Transfers `_value` amount of tokens to address `_to`.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `_value` amount of tokens from address `_from` to address `_to`.

approve.description: Approves `_spender` to spend `_value` amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

available_supply.description: Returns the available supply of tokens.

mintable_in_timeframe.description: Returns the mintable amount of tokens in a given timeframe.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that `_spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `_owner`.

mint.description: Mints `_value` amount of tokens to address `_to`.

burn.description: Burns `_value` amount of tokens from the caller's balance.

set_name.description: Sets the name and symbol of the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens for address `arg0`.

minter.description: Returns the address of the current minter.

admin.description: Returns the address of the current admin.
